page.title: 08INDUSTRY IN WESTON
page.content: Many people in Weston have jobs in nearby towns and some people use the A1 Motorway and mainline railway to commute south to London. Weston has got it's own{industry though and this comprises a{hat {factory, a clothes factory and an {electro guilding factory.}The hat factory, Granthams, manufacture {Bearskin buzby hats.}They use the skin and fur of Canadian black bears and are the only manufacturers in the world. The clothes factory is called Tower Clothiers and they make clothes and{uniforms}particulaly for the goverment and military services. There are several{women employed}as machine operators, sewers and fabric cutters. Electro Plating Services assist in the manufacture of components for the {computer industry.}There is also a garage and filling station.
